section.description: SMART Specific proprietary services that are unique to customer, which cannot be achieved thru out of the box functionality and it does not make sense to develop a generic architecture, since they cannot be reused across other customers.
smart proprietary service logic for routing the msisdn in administrative use-cases only
SMART Pasa Load, Ask 4 Load services
Channels for Charging Customer Info Charge
CS offers association with DA together represents SMART Wallet
Conversion factor to be applied for each SMART wallet before returning to availment
Account finder Manila - XML RPC stack parameters. To add more AF nodes create another section with af suffixed with a number and configure the values
Account finder Cebu - XML RPC Stack parameters
SMART Front Response mapping of backend error/status codes. Backend error code is configured as key and front-end mapped status code is configured as value
Unit Type for the Dedicated Account
